34.ara-name: كتاب الرؤيا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu 'Abdur-Rahman(As-Sulami) narrated from 'Ali and I think he said:" From the Prophet(s.a.w), who said: "Whoever lies about his dream, he will be required to knot barely kernels on the Day of Judgement

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الَّذِي يَكْذِبُ فِي حُلْمِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Lying About His Bad Dream
